description: Imagine driving a big monster truck on a Moon-like planet while other monster trucks get in your way. You fly along in your monster truck, bouncing over rough terrain, collecting weapons and power-ups, all the while avoiding other drivers whose sole purpose is to prevent you from finishing the race. In other words, OFF WORLD INTERCEPTOR offers some fast and furious racing action. You can also take on a friend in the versus mode, and see who is king of the Moon monster trucks.
title: Off-World Interceptor Extreme

description: Rez is out to destroy the Television Realm, and only Gex the Gecko can save it. Unfortunately, Gex has retired, but a huge pile of cash from the government quickly changed his mind. You take control of Gex as he travels through 24 levels with themes that are parodies of television and movies. In each level Gex must collect remote controls to open new areas and eventually fight the level boss. Throughout all of the levels, Gex (voiced by HBO comedian Dana Gould) rattles off a variety of wise cracks to lighten the mood of the game. Many of the comments are keyed to the theme of the area Gex is exploring. Will Gex be able to defeat Rez? Will he be able to get over his television addiction? Find the answers to these questions by playing GEX: Enter the Gecko.
title: Gex

description: The evil Baron Dark has stolen the Lightstar Crystal. With it, he can turn anyone into one of his slaves. You take the role of Prince Lightstar, and you've got to battle your way through 20 levels of intense fighting action as you pursue the Baron and try to recover the crystal. Along the way, you will encounter the skeleton hoard, but they're easily dispatched with your trusty sword. In addition to the skeletons, you will also face birds, bats, dogs, and other animals. There are total of 100 different enemies, each with unique strengths and weaknesses. Thanks to the power of the PlayStation, every enemy and character is smoothly animated. Everything from jumps to skeleton explosions are accomplished cleanly with no graphical hiccups. Try to defeat the evil Baron and save the Lightstar Crystal in SKELETON WARRIORS.
title: Skeleton Warriors

description: Try to escape from Sin Sin Prison and clear your name in JOHNNY BAZOOKATONE. You take the role of the title character as he tries to escape from prison, traveling through lushly drawn environments including a vine-filled courtyard and a catwalk filled inner sanctum while battling the various enemies that block your path. Luckily, you have your trusty guitar to help dispatch the enemies. To eliminate the enemies quickly, you can use a special shockwave attack. Not all of the levels have you battling bad guys, though. At one point, you must navigate a sewer system while riding in a rocket-powered wheelchair. A soundtrack featuring Bon Jovi guitarist Richie Sambora makes the game rock and roll all night. Will Johnny be able to escape from prison and clear his name? Find out by playing JOHNNY BAZOOKATONE.
title: Johnny Bazookatone

description: PGA TOURÂ¿96 is an early entry in the long line of PGA Tour titles for the PlayStation. The interface is intuitive and easy to use, and the expansive list of gameplay options results in a fun and gratifying experience. It has two courses (Sawgrass and Spanish Bay), real golfers, various camera angles, and precise play control, resulting in an ultra-realistic golf experience. You can also take on a friend in the Versus mode, which has Best Ball, Skins, and Match Play. PGA TOUR '96 is one of the games that helped set the table for future golf games, and it is worth checking out.
platforms: PS Gen PC SNES Saturn 3DO GB
title: PGA Tour '96

description: Go retro with Namco Museum Vol. 1, a collection of some of the best games from the glory days of the arcade. This volume features Pac-Man, Galaga, Pole Position, Bosconian, Rally-X, New Rally X, and Toy Pop.
title: Namco Museum Vol. 1

description: Race the world's most exciting supercars, each modeled after its real-life counterpart on six challenging, scenic tracks. Pick your race: Time Trials, Head-To-Head, Single Race or Tournament.
title: Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed

description: The rally is on! Four venomous computer opponents try to make your job as tough as possible as you speed around six of the most harrowing rally courses the world has ever known. Journey deep into the desert, through the lush hills of Europe, and around gigantic stadiums as you try to prove your driving superiority. The more you win, the more vehicles you can unlock but with 20 different racers to reveal, you've got your work cut out for you. There are four hardcore rally trucks included in the bunch, and each has its own independent suspension, speed, handling, and acceleration ratings to help you choose the right one. Mud throwing, fishtailing, and forcing wrecks are all par for the course, as you do what you have to in the heat of battle. Beware, though: the powerslides, rolling crashes, and head-on collisions might look cool, but they'll damage your vehicle for good. Test your mettle in a Season, or enter a Tournament, choosing from three difficulty levels and four unique perspectives. You'd better wear your helmet for this rally, folks.
title: Rally Cross

description: It isn't every day that a unique, innovative adventure comes along, but SPIDER certainly falls into that category. Get into the body of an eight-legged, multi-eyed tarantula in this 32-level, 3D graphic adventure from Boss Studios and BMG Interactive. You control the spider, a bug with the conscience of a scientist who, in 2018, was shot for his cybernetic spider inventions. As an arachnid, utilize different arms both offensive weapons and defensive tools to crawl to victory against the evil forces that have caused your current physical form. Of course, you're not limited to ground movement alone. The walls and ceilings are also home to your web-spinning ways, but you have to be cautious around all obstacles, whether it's fire, water, or just a plain test tube you're only an inch tall! Your fearsome adversaries include slugs, bats, an energized cerebrum, and a host of vile creatures. Take control, strap on some new arms, and don't get stepped on!
title: Spider

description: When elements of Tag are combined with elements from Capture the Flag, GRID RUNNER is the result. The players run around a maze trying to capture a number of flags. The catch is that only one player has the ability to collect the flags at any one time. The player who is collecting the flags must watch out for opponents who will try to tag them and steal the flag-capturing ability. To make the entire situation more interesting, all of the players can use magical powers (including fireballs, electric bridges, and mines) to defend themselves. There are also teleport pads and launchers that allow quick access to different parts of each maze, and can be used as escape routes. There is also two-player mode for some friendly competition. Strap on the running shoes, and try to survive the excitement and challenges of GRID RUNNER.
title: Grid Runner

description: Got an itch to shoot some 8 Ball but you don't own a table and it's miles to the nearest pool hall? Just pop VIRTUAL POOL into your PlayStation and you're good to go. Multiple points-of-view enhance the play and make this a true billiards experience. Need to check out that shot from a different angle? Walk all the way around the table, duck to eye level with the felt, even get a birds-eye-view from directly overhead. Want to bank it off two sidewalls and sink it in the corner pocket? With precise cue stick control, you can put the right amount of English on the ball. VIRTUAL POOL gives you the chance to practice your shots in single-player Free Pool mode, and you can even learn to master some tricks of the trade from Machine Gun Lou Butera through the use of full-motion video clips. With multiple games to choose from such as 8 Ball, 9 Ball, Rotation, and Straight Pool, you can play single-player against the computer or invite a friend over and attempt to hustle him in Two-Player mode. Either way, you call the shots in VIRTUAL POOL.
title: Virtual Pool

description: If you are a true pinball aficionado then PRO PINBALL is worth your while. It offers everything that your typical modern pinball table has, like a three flipper configuration, bumpers, elevated rails, magnets, ramps, sink holes, and ball locks meaning you can have up to six balls going at any given time! There's even a dot-matrix display with little video movies and challenges, resulting in the most realistic pinball simulation you've ever seen. The table you are playing on is called the Web, which will deliver a solid pinball experience. In the game, the player must accomplish several different goals and objectives on The Web, with lots of scoring opportunities along the way. PRO PINBALL also provides six different table views, giving you every possible angle.
title: Pro-Pinball

description: After you magical sword kills your father, the King, your brother accuses you of murder. You are found guilty and sentenced to burn at the stake. With the flames rising around you, you call out for help an agent of the devil saves you, but you must pay with your soul. Now, you are the guardian of a wicked castle, and your sole purpose is to lure and kill adventurers in hopes of reviving Satan. However, you do not face the adventurers directly. You must place traps around the castle and use yourself as bait to lure the invaders into the traps. Do you kill for gold, sacrifice souls for magic, or try to keep the bodies around to create monsters? The choices are yours in TECMO'S DECEPTION: Invitation to Darkness.
title: Deception: Invitation to Darkness

description: PEAK PERFORMANCE is a racing game based on the Chevrolet Pikes Peak International Hill Climb. The signature course, Pikes Peak Hill Climb, is a solitary climb up a mountain, with more turns on one track than most have in an entire game. This track, as with half of the other four courses, features a combination of dirt and pavement in both urban and rural settings, providing enough variety and difficulty to keep things interesting. Each of the game's 25 cars has its own feel, giving the game a good amount of depth and keeping the replay value high. Each car can also be colored, named, and completely customized, right down to the wheels.
title: Peak Performance

description: INDEPENDENCE DAY brings the alien blasting action of the movie to the PlayStation. Aliens are invading Earth, and you are the only person who can stop them. Take the controls of a fighter plane and fight through 13 missions in cities across the globe. At the beginning of the game, your will pilot a F or A 18 Hornet, but power-ups scattered throughout the levels will unlock more powerful planes, including an alien fighter ship. Should your friends want a dogfight, challenge them with either the two-player split screen mode or use a link cable for some head-to-head competition. No matter how you play, voice work from Will Smith and full-motion video clips will make you think you are watching the movie. With Earth under attack, only the best of the best will be able to create another INDEPENDENCE DAY.
platforms: PS PC Saturn RZone Pinball Cell
title: Independence Day

description: Late '80s arcade games often had unusual premises but very addictive gameplay; BUSTER BROTHERS was one of those games. Simply put, large balloons threatened the safety of the character at the bottom of the screen. His only chance at survival was to throw a spiked chain in the air to pop the balloon. However, this was no ordinary inflated piece of rubber: after being hit by a spike, the balloon would split into smaller, faster balloons that were harder to avoid. Luckily, the videogame gods made things easier by dropping power-ups from the sky. All of this excitement and action is brought to the PlayStation with BUSTER BROTHERS COLLECTION. Included in the package is the original BUSTER BROTHERS arcade game along with SUPER BUSTER BROTHERS and the never-released BUSTER BUDDIES.
title: Buster Bros. Collection

description:
After escaping from prison, the six Loaded's anti-heroes -- Loaded, Mamma, Bounca, Butch, Cap'n'hands, Sister Magpie and The Consumer -- take brutal revenge C.H.E.B., the betrayer who put them there. These maniacal killers will be slaying and destroying anything in the six levels forming their path, as C.H.E.B. meanwhile finds nothing better to do than evolve into a monstrous being hell-bent on universal domination!

If you like your games violent, you're in for a sick treat with Re-Loaded, the sequel to the popular blood-fest shooter Loaded. Re-Loaded is set over a number of 3D levels each more harrowing than the last. The sound effects will have you cringing, and the character animations show each minuscule trait of the six maniacs. Characters range from armed robots to bloodthirsty cannibal girls, and each is vicious enough to destroy anything in its path. Choose your lunatic and blast, slash, and bite your way to sweet freedom.
title: Re-Loaded: The Hardcore Sequel

description: The action of driving and crashing is back with DESTRUCTION DERBY 2. This time around, there are eight tracks that are longer and wider with jumps, flips, and criss-cross sections. Choose from three cars and join a Stock Car (slam and bash your way to first place) or Wreckin' Race (score points by slamming into other cars and causing big accidents). When crashes get really big, watch cars and debris fly into the air. Don't worry, though, a quick pit stop will fix most of the damage. If the idea of going around a track trying to hit your opponents gives you hives, then join the Destruction Derby and slam your way to victory. Enjoy all of the hard rock jams from some of the hottest bands that accompany all of the action. Do you have the skill and endurance to survive DESTRUCTION DERBY 2?
title: Destruction Derby 2

description: Kain was once a nobleman in Nosgoth. But when he was murdered, an evil spirit offers Kain the chance to return and get revenge. However, there is a catch: Kain must serve the evil spirit and will return as the vampire destroyer of Nosgoth. Rather than take eternal rest, Kain chooses revenge. You take control of the Vampire Lord Kain as he seeks revenge on his murderers and tries to destroy the evil spirit that he serves. These are not easy tasks though, and they will require Kain to transform into a bat, wolf, nobleman, and mist. When Kain is hurt, he must drink human blood or once again face death. Your intellect and well as your reaction time will be tested with the varied gameplay found in Blood Omen. Will Kain be able to get revenge and destroy his master?
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain

description: Prepare yourself for dangerous underground combat action in TUNNEL B1 for the PlayStation. Command your specialized B1 hovercraft in fierce battles, as you attempt to bring down an evil madman intent on detonating a thermonuclear explosion and destroying the world. Traverse dark and ominous caverns, dank sewers, and winding tunnels at super speeds while blasting enemies and collecting hidden power-ups. Compete in frenzied, timed races against frightening drones which you must hunt down and eliminate, and fight fast helicopters and steel-hardened tanks determined to bring about your demise. Use all the weapons in your deadly arsenal including standard guns, powerful rockets, blistering lasers, flares and mines to do your job. You'll have to take out entrenched enemy gun turrets, unlock security doors to reach new and tougher stages, explore vast subterranean environments, and avoid devious traps in an intense quest to save humankind. In TUNNEL B1 only you and your gaming skills stand in the way of certain destruction.
title: Tunnel B-1

description: Once again the minions of Hell are trying to take over the Earth, and it's up to a lone space Marine to travel to Hell to save the world. As the hero, you will have to make your way through narrow corridors and hallways, in levels designed especially for the Nintendo 64. Along the way, you will face many old foes including cyber demons, mutant space Marines, flaming skulls, and cacodemons. The classic DOOM weapons also make their return and include pistols, grenade launchers, and the awesome BFG 9000. In addition to obtaining weapons and killing everything in sight, finding key cards and switches are necessary to get to the end of each level. With the power of the Nintendo 64, several graphical improvements have been made the graphics engine renders a true 3D world, and new light sourcing effects create a new mood and atmosphere for the game. You're the only one who can save the Earth from demons in DOOM 64.
platforms: N64 SNES PC 32X Amiga Mac GP32 GP32 Jaguar Xbox 360 iPhone Saturn GBA 3DO PS
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Doom 64

description: NHL FACEOFF '97 has all the basic features you've come to expect from a hockey game. All 26 NHL teams from the 1997 season are included, and you'll find all the players as well. The Season mode lets you take a team through a full slate of games while you keep an eye on how the rest of the league is doing. Players can be traded from one team to another, and created as well. This is Sony's first PlayStation hockey series, and graphically it is considered one of the best-looking hockey games ever to appear on the system. You'll find all the action of the real game here, including wicked slap shots, hard body checks, and plenty of fancy skating and stick handling. Up to eight human players can duke it out via a multitap. So if you're looking for a complete hockey simulation, look no further than NHL FACEOFF '97.
title: NHL FaceOff '97

description: Though the single-player mode is a bit of a step back from the SNES original, Mario Kart 64 still offers one of the best multiplayer experiences to be had on Nintendo 64. Like its predecessor, the title is once again a kart race featuring classic Nintendo mascots. This time around players can race as everybody from Mario himself to Luigi, Bowser, the Princess, Yoshi, Donkey Kong and Wario. Mario Kart 64 features a good selection of straightforward single-player levels that allow players to sabotage computer controlled opponents on the roadside with various power-up bonuses. But the main attraction is the addictive multiplayer mode in which up to four players can battle against each other through several arena-style environments.
title: Mario Kart 64

description: If you crossed a puzzle game with Street Fighter the result would be Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo. At the outset you choose a Street Fighter character like Ryu, Ken, or Chun Li. After choosing your warrior, he or she will help you place falling blocks into groups of four. When a crash crystal drops, you can use it to eliminate the grouped blocks. Do you have the reflexes to defeat Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo?
title: Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo

description: If you like your basketball arcade-style, take note: it just doesn't get any more arcade-style than HANG TIME. The two-on-two action is extreme, as you choose two players from your favorite team and send them into high-flying, in-your-face basketball action. With better animation than any game of its kind, NBA HANG TIME features hysterical, running play-by-play commentary to keep things comical. The players and stats have all been updated to reflect current lineups and trends, and each NBA team is represented.  If the regular NBA guys are boring you, you can actually create your own player! Choose from a variety of body types and heads (they include animal faces and the likenesses of the game's designers), then give your player any attributes you think will give you an edge. The more games you win with your player, the more points you get, and the better you can make your player. HANG TIME offers some great options, such as AI assistance, very effective power-ups, oversized heads, and lots of humorous codes to change the gameplay around. It might not look anything like real basketball, but Shaq just can't do a quadruple flip in real life .
platforms: N64 PS Arcade PC SNES Gen
title: NBA Hang Time

description: In the first in this series of RPGs by Konami, you are the son of the General Teo, one of the emperor's most powerful generals. Immediately, your father leaves to fight a battle up north leaving a few of his trusted friends to watch over of you. Soon after, you come to realize that you and your father have been serving on the wrong side. The Emperor and his generals' minds have been brainwashed. The result is unhappy subjects and an enslaved country. Knowing this, you join the Liberation Army and when their heroic leader is assassinated by the baddies, you are chosen as leader. Your job now is to recruit thousands of men to join the Liberation Army and restore peace to the country. Along the way you will have to fight in three different styles of battle: normal, one-on-one, and war. See if you can bring justice to the world in Suikoden.
title: Suikoden

description: Storyline isn't important in BATTLE STATIONS. What is important is blowing your enemy's ship into nothing. You have the opportunity to play a variety of war games, either with a friend or against the computer. BATTLE STATIONS offers 76 intense missions that can be played as single-player or multiplayer, and there are a total of three exciting gameplay options: Arcade, Campaign, and War Games. Your goal in Arcade mode is to become fleet admiral by sinking as many enemy ships as you can. The ship-to-ship fighting in Arcade mode is action-packed. In the Campaign mode, it will be you versus the computer in several single-player missions. You'll go up against one of five different enemy admirals, each with their own tactics and specialties. What may very well make this game shine is its outstanding Multiplayer mode. In Multiplayer, you can play many war games in one of 26 different locations. Your goal is to sink your opponent's ship while taking little damage to your own ship, so that it can come back to fight again. You can also play different games such as Capture the Harbor and Capture the Flag, each providing their own unique brand of gameplay.
title: Battle Stations

description: NANOTEK WARRIOR is a shooter that uses a behind the back perspective, which was relatively new for shooters of this type when the game was released (1997). The action is centered in and around long tubes, with your goal being to blast everything in your path. You'll come across a plethora of special weapons as you travel along the tube, as well as extra energy for your shields. If you're feeling particularly daring, you can even jump off the tube, if only for a second, to either fire at something in the air or to jump over an obstacle. At the end of each stage you'll come to a special boss level, where you orbit around a big enemy and go one-on-one. These boss levels help break up the gameplay and add even more challenge to this fast-paced shooter.
title: Nanotek Warrior

description: Start your engine and take off like a bat out of hell. In the grand tradition of arcade classics like SPY HUNTER, RUSH HOUR throws racing physics and realistic handling out the window and replaces them good, old-fashioned videogame fun. Boasting excellent 3D-textured environments, the game's focus is on arcade-style racing rather than combat, convoluted storylines, and evil enemies. There are more than eight tracks that will test your mettle, and each is more challenging than the last. The detailed environments seem to go on for ages, as you race sports cars and trucks, several of which can be unlocked as you advance through the contest. If you want to analyze what you did wrong at a particular point in the game (or if you want to show off to a friend), check out the awesome Replay feature. Featuring a cool rock-and-roll soundtrack to keep your toes tapping, sound effects that will have you jumping from your seat, and gameplay that's sure to remind you of gaming's salad days, RUSH HOUR is a real rush.
title: Rush Hour

description: Beltlogger 9 is a mining colony on the edge of a black hole. Suddenly, Central Command loses contact with Beltlogger 9. To find out what has happened, the powers that be send the elite BRAHMA Force to investigate. As the squadron of mech warriors approaches the silent colony, they are attacked, and only a lone survivor makes it to Beltlogger 9. It is now up to you, the sole survivor, to find out what is going on and who is responsible. Run, jump, and blast your way through 22 levels including docks, residential areas, and prisons in the assault mech. Take on the bad guys using the mech's lasers, machine guns, missiles, and rocket launchers. Will you be able to save the Mining colony and any of its survivors? Play BRAHMA FORCE: The Assault on Beltlogger 9 and find out.
title: BRAHMA Force: The Assault On Beltlogger 9

description: The class divide is growing ever wider; the wealthy add to their riches and the poor are near destitute. Compounded by the fact that the government is utterly corrupt, the lower classes are on the verge of revolution, and it's up to you to prevent total anarchy in Vandal Hearts. In this RPG or Strategy hybrid, you take on powerful monsters and villainous bosses with your band of renegade warriors, mages, and clerics. Engage in turn-based strategic battles paying heed to the strengths and weaknesses of the seven different character classes flying characters have an advantage over knights, while knights have an advantage over bowmen and, in turn, bowmen have an advantage over flying characters. As your characters advance in levels, chose a path in which they can excel for instance, your archer can become either a bowman or a hawknight. Take into account the terrain of your battlefield and use natural features such as mountains, boulders and valleys to your benefit. Now you can wade into glorious battle with Vandal Hearts.
title: Vandal Hearts

description: MECHWARRIOR 2 gives you the chance to strap yourself into a 40-ton hunk of metal armed with a full arsenal of weapons and wreak havoc on a futuristic band of enemies. The game features eight brand new missions and 32 reworked versions of popular PC campaigns. At the outset of the game you can choose between the Wolf Clan and Jade Falcon squads, or opt for the "instant action" feature to jump right into the fray. No matter which route you take, be ready for some explosive action, as every mission calls for you to destroy something. The emphasis in the PlayStation version is shoot-Â¿em-up action, but fans of the PC version will still be able to trick out their mechanical monster to their heart's content. If you love mech games or you just want to deal out some damage, then you should check this game out.
title: MechWarrior 2

description: America's favorite pastime and America's technological know-how combine to create a "virtual reality" at the ballpark in VR BASEBALL '97. If you're a sports fan who can never seem to get enough variety in your videogames then this may be the title to appease you. VR BASEBALL '97 gives you the ability to play any position with more than 700 Major League Baseball players in 28 MLB stadiums. Play pro ball from virtually any perspective you can think of including that of the ball! With the game's Virtual Field Vision the true, real-time 3D camera angles are unlimited. Revel in the motion-captured animation as the polygonal pros bat, run, field, and slide in all their smooth glory. Play in day or night games, watch state-of-the-art physics models control ball movement and reaction, and keep up to date with a real-time working scoreboard displaying scores, pitches, and other vital stats. The big screen in-stadium TV will show off all your playing finesse as you blast a homer out of the park.
title: VR Baseball '97

description: NEED FOR SPEED 2, the second game in the series, puts a new twist on racing, as it includes high-performance cars and open-road racing. When you factor in some beautifully rendered scenery, you've got yourself a top-notch racing game. As with the first NEED FOR SPEED, you can choose from a variety of high-performance machines, including the Dodge Viper, Lamborghini, Ferrari, Porsche, Corvette, Mazda RX7, Toyota Supra Turbo, and Acura NSX. There are six unique tracks to choose from, with three of them offering open road racing. The game also features split-screen two-player racing that lets you and a friend go at it. As far as the tracks go, there are six to choose from, three being open road.
title: Need for Speed II

description: SNK's arcade hit SAMURAI SHODOWN III: Blades of Blood has finally come to the PlayStation in a near-perfect conversion. You can choose your warrior from among 12 different characters, each with unique attacks, weapons, and combinations. Furthermore, every character has two distinct personalities that alter which of the characters attacks are available. While other fighting games focus on fast, furious attack combinations, the SAMURAI SHODOWN games have always focused on patience. Players must defend and look for opportunities to get in attacks. Mashing buttons in hopes of pulling off one spectacular move will lead to certain death. Besides challenging the computer-controlled opposition, you can also challenge your friends to a match. Try to destroy the competition in SAMURAI SHODOWN III: Blades of Blood.
platforms: PS NG NGCD Saturn GB Arcade Wii Saturn
title: Samurai Shodown III: Blades of Blood

description: MORTAL KOMBAT TRILOGY brings the whole MORTAL KOMBAT universe to the PlayStation on one disc. Die-hard fans of the series will go krazy over all-new finishing moves and a new secret character: Chameleon. In addition to the multitude of great-looking backgrounds and digitized characters, MORTAL KOMBAT TRILOGY also includes more options, as players can do more than change the difficulty and toggle the violence mode; a new feature called "auto" combos can be used, which make the standard multi-button attacks much easier to pull off. You can also take on a friend in the Multiplayer mode and see who is the real king of kombat. Of course, no MORTAL KOMBAT game would be complete without all the fatalities and other staples of the MK franchise, and TRILOGY is no exception.
platforms: PS N64 Saturn G.com PC RZone
rating_content: Realistic Blood and Gore, Realistic Violence
title: Mortal Kombat Trilogy

description: Get ready for some fast sports action in PITBALL. The game takes place in arenas located on several planets scattered throughout a fictional galaxy. Each team's competitors fight for control of the energized Pitball, using attack moves both complex and simple. Once the Pitball is in possession, the player attempts to shoot it into the goal, which is a tiny hole at the top of the pit wall. With either fast but weak or slow yet strong teams to match your style of play, the variety of maneuvers and attacks results in some very exciting matches. The Season mode is great: using a combination of in-the-pit and behind-the-scenes maneuvering, it allows players to take a team and guide it from the bottom to the top. It's even possible to let the computer play the matches, which comes in handy when you'd prefer to rest your tired thumbs and focus on management.
title: Pitball

description: MLB PENNANT RACE offers players a choice between an Arcade mode that allows players to throw pitches unhindered by the laws of physics, or Sim mode where everything is more realistic. Fans of old-school baseball games like RBI BASEBALL or other arcade titles will feel right at home with the quick and exciting control of the arcade version. In both modes there are a wealth of stats for gamers to peruse and study, and the obligatory Playoff and World Series mode as well as Quick Play, Season and Home Run Derby can also be found. Or you can take on a friend in the Versus mode and find out who is going to take the pennant home.
title: MLB Pennant Race

description: TEMPEST was huge arcade hit in the 1980s. Vector graphics combined with a rotating control knob and easy to learn (but hard to master) gameplay made it a game that sucked the allowance out of your pocket one quarter at a time. Now that same game has come to the PlayStation with TEMPEST X3. In addition to the Classic Tempest, there are two other modes of play. In Tempest X, there are warp gates that will get you through certain levels, and an AI-controlled droid that helps you through some of the tougher spots. There is also Tempest Duel, which pits you against a friend and an unlimited supply of enemies. All of the action takes place to a new techno soundtrack that puts you in the right mood for the fast action that ensues . If you lost your allowance to a TEMPEST cabinet, then you should run out and get TEMPEST X3.
title: Tempest X3: An Inter-Galactic Battle Zone

description: In PROJECT OVERKILL, you control one of four characters stranded on a remote world. In this mission-based game, your goal is to make your way through every nook and cranny of the world, shooting first and asking questions later. Gamers can shoot in any direction while running in another one, giving the game a real run-and-gun feel. The D-pad is used to control the character's movements and the four action buttons serve to control which direction the character is aiming. The game has many unique enemies and plenty of huge bosses with relatively decent AI, so shooting them will be more than a matter of pulling the trigger; you'll actually have to study them a little bit to pick up their habits or patterns. If you're in the mood for some serious carnage, then PROJECT OVERKILL is just what you need.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Project Overkill

description: The PC hit CRUSADER: No Remorse makes its way to the PlayStation. You are a Silencer, an elite enforcer for the World Economic Consortium. The work you do is for the good of the world, or so you believe. You soon discover the corruption of the Consortium, and realize your only choice is to join the resistance. However, the members of the resistance do not trust you. Take on a wide variety of missions: help your new friends escape from prison before they are executed, cripple a city by destroying its power generators, or find a top-secret piece of intelligence to help plan the next attack. Thankfully, you have lots of guns and plenty of things to blow up in every mission. Will you be able to gain the trust of the resistance? Can you stop the evil plans of the World Economic Consortium? Play CRUSADER: No Remorse and find out.
title: Crusader: No Remorse

description: Lace up your golf shoes, grab your clubs, and head to the course with VR GOLF '97. You'll find a huge selection of play modes here including Practice, Skins, Four Ball, Match Play, Stroke Play, Foursome, AMA Tour, and Pro Tour. A user-friendly multi-meter swing system makes it easy to reach the green like a pro all you need to do is take aim, press the X button once for power and again for accuracy. Time it just right, and watch your ball slide into the cup. Having trouble lining up your shot? Not to worry with 11 player views, 11 ball views, and 15 replay angles, you're spoiled for eyeballing choice. Pick out a skin color and stylish outfit for your golfer, listen to commentary from announcers Tony Adamson, Peter Alliss, and Pat O'Brien, play in dry, damp, or wet weather conditions, and much more. With VR GOLF '97 you'll be happily occupied from tee-off to the 18th hole.
title: VR Golf '97

description: In IRON MAN or X-O MANOWAR IN HEAVY METAL, the world is under attack and only Iron Man and X-O Manowar can save the planet. You can choose either character and battle through eight levels that take place in exotic locales like Nuclear Plant, Stark Enterprises, New York City, Rain Forest, Isle, Drill Platform, Dromak Ship and Cyberspace. Both characters have a large number of punch and kick combos that will make dispatching the bad guys easier. However, you can eliminate the enemy much more quickly with special moves like hover, blaster, and the Uni-Beam. Eventually you will have to fight classic Iron Man or X-O Manowar enemies: Goliath, Titania, Yellowjacket, Mr. Hyde, and many others. For those who have a friend, have him grab the other controller and take on the forces of evil together. Only you can help Iron Man and X-O Manowar save the world.
title: Iron Man / XO Manowar in Heavy Metal

description: Mutants, Space Marines, and aliens have destroyed scientific outposts on Mars, and now they are threatening Earth and several space stations. However, the Lightstormer Corp. won't take this lying down. Luckily, they have developed new secret weapons: psionics. The psionic brain implants increase the natural mental powers found in everyone. The increase allows the Lightstormers to heal themselves, drain energy from enemies, or give enemies a nasty electric shock. However, these new powers rapidly eat up psionic energy. Take control of a Lightstormer member as he uses pistols, rifles, cannons, and the ultra powerful plasma lance to blast his way through 13 levels of action with over 20 different kind of enemies. Can the mutants be stopped? Will psionic implants be enough? The answers to these questions can only be found in Disruptor.
title: Disruptor

description: FINAL DOOM is the last game in the popular DOOM series. The minions of Hell are making a final attempt to take over the Earth, and once again a lone space marine is the planet's last hope. Use shotguns, pistols, rocket launchers, and even the BFG 9000 to send these demons and monsters back to Hell. There are plenty of monsters to destroy in the game's 40 levels that are stretched across three different worlds: the Master Levels, the Plutonia Experiment, and TNT: Evilution. It should be noted that all of the Master Levels were created by fans of the series and are included for hardcore fans. Should blasting through hoards of computer-controlled enemies become tiresome, pull out the link cable and challenge someone to a deathmatch. Only you can save the Earth from destruction in FINAL DOOM.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Final Doom

description:
Race into destruction-packed madness with TWISTED METAL 2. In this sequel to the acclaimed TWISTED METAL, you are the speediest and meanest king of the road. Your task is to choose from more than 10 hi-tech, battle-hardened street machines like taxicabs, police cars, motorcycles, and ice cream trucks and compete in furious contests of brute force and GLADIATOR-style survival.

In the tradition of films like DEATH RACE 2000 and ROAD WARRIOR, you'll smash through fully interactive 3D worlds as you crash from house to house, hi-rise to low-rise, and street to street in a frenzied attempt to escape your hellish pursuers and emerge on top. In Single-Player mode or Head-to-Head battle, you'll blitz through eight expanded worlds, shooting and maneuvering against bizarre foes and fearsome criminals. Engage in lethal warfare with majestic weapons like machine guns, flamethrowers, napalm, and homing-missile launchers. You can also switch between four camera views including dashboard POV and third-person perspective. In the psycho, tire-screeching, insanity of TWISTED METAL 2 you'll need to dodge, dent and destroy your way to survival.
title: Twisted Metal 2

description: Sony's football franchise carries on with another intense NFL match-up. In addition to all the features you expect from this series, GameDay '97 also includes new options like season-ending injuries, a full-fledged draft, more statistics, and the ability to create players. You'll also get expanded camera control, allowing you to place the camera at any angle. Every NFL team (over 1,500 players) and all stadiums are also included, letting you put your favorite team on the filed for some intense NFL action. But where the game really shines is in the gameplay. The control is deadly accurate, meaning diving catches are a distinct possibility. Making one-handed grabs, diving into the end zone, and even running out of bounds and slamming into the coach are also possible. And with a multitap seven of your friends can get in on the action.
title: NFL GameDay 97

description: See the future of racing today with JET MOTO, where you take the controls of vehicle that is a cross between a motorcycle and a hovercraft. There are 20 vehicles with different acceleration, handling, weight, and speed attributes. After you are straddling the right vehicle, use the Practice mode to learn course layouts and get used to the controls especially using the grappling hook to make tight turns. When you are ready for some competition, enter a Single Race or a Custom Circuit. For the ultimate challenge, try to win the championship with in a Full Season of races through beaches, mountains, and swamps. If you have a friend that wants in on the action, use the two-player mode to challenge them to a race. Bring home the future of motor sports with JET MOTO.
title: Jet Moto

description: FIFA Soccer 64 delivers the intensity and drama of international soccer to the Nintendo 64. You can choose from 150 national and club teams and develop your tactics and strategies in a friendly match. And when the time comes, try to win a Tournament. If you like something more substantial than tournament play, try to win a Season and become a league champion, or skip straight to the Playoffs. Should a friend want to join the action, he can with the Two-Player mode. In all of the game modes, you can play with free-and-loose Arcade rules, or strict referees and penalties in Simulation. Thanks to the motion-captured animation, you'll get smooth and realistic player movement, which helps put you in the middle of the action. Try to become an international soccer sensation with FIFA Soccer 64.
title: FIFA Soccer 64

description: The PC hit COMMAND AND CONQUER comes to the PlayStation. Play as either the terrorist organization Brotherhood of Nod (BON) or the peacekeeping Global Defense Initiative (GDI). The choice is reminiscent of the choice between GI Joe and Cobra. Each side has unique missions, troops, and buildings. The GDI tends to focus on defense and resource gathering while BON focuses on having superior firepower. All of the missions from the original PC version, 15 missions from the Covert Operations expansion disk, and five exclusive PlayStation missions are included. The original gameplay remains intact even with the change in platform. In general, missions consist of establishing and defending a base, gathering resources, and destroying the enemy base. Terrorize the world or save it; the choice is yours with COMMAND AND CONQUER.
platforms: PS PS3 N64 PC PSP Mac Saturn
title: Command & Conquer (1997)

description: A giant meteor containing two robots crashes down on the surface of the planet. The evil Dr. Wiley takes control of one of the robots and uses it to wreak havoc on an unsuspecting world, while Mega Man befriends the other robot. Now, he and his newfound friend are out to stop Dr. Wiley and his mad plans to rule the universe. Everything that you would expect from MEGA MAN is here, from the gameplay to the graphics. The environments and characters are rendered with anime-inspired 2D graphics that will take your breath away. As Mega Man, you must fight robots and other enemies through 14 levels of intense action. As an added bonus, when you defeats a boss character you are able to use that character's weapon through the rest of your journey. Along the way, you'll also collect bolts that will allow you to upgrade your parts or temporarily make yourself invincible. It's up to you to save the world from Dr. Wiley once again in MEGA MAN 8.
title: Mega Man 8

description: BIG BASS WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP places you into the world of competitive, professional fishing. Customize your tackle box and fishing style, then head out to Raccoon Lake and take on the pros in the Tournament mode. If the competition keeps stressing you out, go for a casual afternoon of relaxation in the Practice mode. No matter how you choose to play the game, the underwater camera will capture every second of fish fighting action. With all of the action and excitement of professional fishing, BIG BASS WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP will keep all the future Hank Parker's of the world happy.
title: Big Bass World Championship

description: Back in 1997, Blast Corps served as an important reminder that not every game had to be a sequel to an existing franchise to pack mass appeal. Put together by British second-party developer Rare, Blast Corps is almost like a nostalgic trip back to the heydays of the NES or the time of Robotron and Missile Command. The game puts players behind the controls of current and futuristic destruction machinery with the objective of clearing a path for an out-of-control nuclear missile carrier. Released to very little media hype, Blast Corps quickly won the hearts of N64 owners by offering a well-rounded combination of destructive gameplay and intelligent puzzles, topped off with a rocking soundtrack and good graphics.
title: Blast Corps

description: NBA Live '97 features all 29 NBA teams plus two all-star teams, which translates to over 300 real NBA players including rookies on updated rosters As far as gameplay goes, you've got Exhibition, Season, and Playoff modes, as well as all-new offensive and defensive plays. The interesting thing about the plays is that they can be programmed and changed on the fly. You also get all the action you'd expect to see in a basketball sim rim-rattling dunks, fade away jumpers, delicate finger rolls, and even no look, behind the back passes. Motion capture sessions were done by NBA star Mitch Richmond, so you can expect some great moves. This game also marks the first appearance of Shaquille O'Neal in an EA game.
title: NBA Live '97

description: Nothing can beat the intense competition of NBA basketball, and now you can experience that action on your PlayStation with NBA SHOOTOUT '97. Every team and player in the NBA has been included so you'll find that your favorite team is intact. You can challenge a friend or the computer to a single game in the Exhibition mode, or try to prove that you are a master by leading a team to the World Championship in the Season mode. When you don't want to deal with a season, skip it and go straight to the Playoffs. All of the modes can be played as a simulation (that counts every foul and violation) or a wide-open arcade-style game that lets you run and gun without worrying about all the rules. The most innovative feature is the icon passing system that ensures you get the ball into the right player's hands. Now you can get some of the best basketball action available with NBA SHOOTOUT '97.
title: NBA ShootOut '97

description:
Take on prehistoric predators of all shapes and sizes as Turok: Dinosaur Hunter. The 14 high-tech weapons that you'll use in your strides to obliterate the scaled beasts include knives, a Tek-Bow, a grenade launcher, a pulse rifle, a quad rocket launcher, and an atomic fusion cannon.

This single-player adventure takes you through 3D worlds as you scale surfaces and swim underwater to take out razor-toothed raptors, triceratops, pterodactyls, and even alien marauders. This dangerous world has lots of surprises waiting for you, with additional obstacles like swinging logs, spiked branches, and crushing rockfalls. Sound difficult? At least you'll be able to pick up health, ammo, and weaponry along the way to give you a leg up on your enemies. You'd better be on your toes if you hope to stay alive in this revolutionary trip through time.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter

description: The game follows the basic plot of the movie. You, as Ashe, have been killed by nefarious criminal types for no reason. The spiritual power of the crow brings you back from the dead to reap vengeance on those who have wronged you. You move through a 3D, fixed camera environment as various bad people attack you a few at a time. The camera has been fixed in one pre-determined place in each room/environment. Released by Acclaim.
title: The Crow: City of Angels

description: The Empire is trying to create robotic soldiers known as Dark Troopers. The Rebel Alliance catches wind of this and hires Kyle Katarn to find the plans for creating and using them. You take the role of Katarn as he fights his way through 14 missions of intense action. The game is played from a first-person perspective, which puts right in the middle of the STAR WARS universe. You'll have to run, jump, crouch, and shoot your way through every nook and cranny of each stage. There will be an army of Stormtroopers, Gamorrean guards, probe droids, and other enemies on the lookout for a suspicious humanoid, so stay on your toes. Help the Rebel Alliance in its continuing fight against the Empire in STAR WARS: Dark Forces.
platforms: PS Mac GP32 PC PS3 PSP
title: Star Wars: Dark Forces

description: Jump into a world of amazing adventure with the classic Tomb Raider. You are the incredible Lara Croft, a gorgeous, intelligent, highly skilled explorer of stunning proportions. With a wide array of stylish and lethal moves at your disposal and a ready arsenal of weapons to employ you're ready to meet any challenge head on. Seek out the mysterious Scion, investigate creepy, deathtrap filled tombs, and uncover hidden treasures. You'll have to do battle against angry raptors, snarling wolves, and a towering T-Rex along the way, so get your trigger finger ready. There are also plenty of mind-bending puzzles to put your brain to the test as well.
platforms: PS GBC PS3 iPhone PSP NNG TAP Saturn PC
title: Tomb Raider -- Featuring Lara Croft

description: Go back to the salad days of 2D platforming with Pandemonium. The plot is simple: Nikki the sorceress has inadvertently summoned a huge monster that is now going around wreaking havoc on innocent people. You and Fargus a strange court jester must pass through 18 levels of crazy platforms and wacky enemies to get to the wish place, where you'll face the monster. You can choose from two characters at the beginning of each level: Nikki, who has a double jump useful in beating the many bugs and such, or Fargus, who has a rolling attack that can take out enemies.
platforms: PS Saturn PS3 PC NNG Cell iPhone PSP Saturn
title: Pandemonium

description: Imagine riding down the slopes, avoiding the trees and trying to hit the jumps. When you catch enough air, you grab your board, twist, and land a perfect 180 Japan. All of the action and excitement of snowboarding comes to the PlayStation in COOL BOARDERS. Choose from several different riders and 10 boards, and then hit one of the five courses. On each track you can earn three different trophies: one trophy is awarded for getting down the hill in the quickest time; catch big air to pull off big tricks like the misty, rodeo, and 1080 mute to earn the highest trick point trophy; or win the final trophy by getting the highest total score, which is based on both time and trick points. If the competition seems a little rough, race against the ghost from your last run and find a smoother line down the mountain. All of the action in COOL BOARDERS will keep boarding bums busy for days.
title: Cool Boarders

description: Perform a monster crossover and drive to the hole for two in NBA IN THE ZONE 2. All of the NBA teams and players are included thanks to the official NBA license. After you pick a team, you can get in some action with a single game or try to claim the World Championship by working your way through a Season and Playoffs. As with a real NBA team, you can make trades to improve your squad's chances of winning. What really sets this game apart from others is the realistic graphics: all of the players move fluidly, and they all have little details to make the game authentic, like Rodman's crazy hairdo and Cliff Robinson's headband. Now you can get into the game like never before with NBA IN THE ZONE 2.
title: NBA In the Zone 2

description: Street Fighter Alpha 2 ups the ante on the prequel to the Street Fighter saga with 18 fighters and several new options, including high and low Alpha counters as well as more moves and combos for each character.  In addition, the second title launches the Custom Combo system which lets players use up a super meter to perform devastating multi-hit combos.
platforms: PS Arcade PS3 New 3DS SNES Arcade PC Wii U Wii Saturn PSP
title: Street Fighter Alpha 2

description: If you're ready for extreme, rough and tumble off-road mayhem, then HARDCORE 4X4 is the game for you as you get behind the wheel in a white-knuckle race for glory. HARDCORE 4X4 is the first racing game to feature four-wheel independent suspension combined with accurate, dynamic vehicle physics. Choose from six different, high-powered off-road trucks and race across six bump and thump tracks that include mud-splattered hillsides, snow-covered mountains, dangerous rocky canyons, blistering desert sands, rugged forest trails, and scorching volcano passes. You'll drive your way through torrential rain, blinding snow flurries, and misty fog in both day and nighttime competition. Watch full-motion video clips of real 4X4 fender-bashing action, listen to lively commentary from TNN announcer Gary Lee, groove to a hard-pounding rock and roll soundtrack, and more. Three exciting and challenging race modes are included for your dirt-blasting entertainment: Time Trial, Single Race, and Championship. Go ahead, tear up some track today!
platforms: PS PSP GBA PS3 PC Saturn PC
title: TNN Motorsports Hardcore 4X4

description: Fire up your combat chopper and unleash a reign of fear and fury on the cold-blooded terrorists you've been assigned to waste. As a member of the top secret Black Operations military unit, your objectives are simple: decimate enemy forces, liberate desperate hostages, and navigate your machine through 32 life-or-death missions over 7 war-torn zones in this addictive action free-for-all. Black Dawn. You can almost taste the shrapnel.
title: Black Dawn

description: Another in Namco's line of classic arcade compilations from the vaults, Volume 3 includes six favorite games. Includes Galaxian, Ms. Pac-Man, Pole Position II, Dig Dug, Phozon, and The Tower of Druaga.
title: Namco Museum Vol. 3

description: Light-gun games have been rather sparse on the Playstation, but CRYPT KILLERS tries to remedy that. The game starts with an ancient legend: an ancient civilization existed before the more recent civilizations of the Mayans and Egyptians, but that civilization suddenly disappeared. Some believe that aliens visited the ancient civilization and left behind crystals that allowed people to travel through time. These crystals became known as the Eyes of Guidance. The search for the crystals has heated up since more information has been discovered; you know the locations of the eyes and want to claim them. Move through six levels of catacombs, tombs, tunnels, and rivers while blasting skeletons, spiders, zombies, and rats. If using the standard controller makes life too difficult, plug in any Playstation compatible light gun and let the good times roll. Do you have the skills and reflexes to survive CRYPT KILLERS?
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Crypt Killer

description: In the near future, a giant corporation will have taken over one of Jupiter's moons, with the intention of mining minerals from the moon for profit. However, the World Government wants to use the minerals to benefit humanity. A war always breaks out when greed and altruism collide, and this is where you step in. You aren't a soldier, you're an engineer and computer programmer, and you are going to run the war. You'll have to Construct Overkill Engines (OKEs) which are unmanned mechs from available parts or invest money in research and design. Once the basic design for your OKEs is complete, program their AI. Every aspect of combat must be accounted for: when to dodge, how to attack, what evasive maneuvers to take. Then let the OKEs act according to their programs. In the war of CARNAGE HEART, brains, not brawn, will win the day.
title: Carnage Heart

description: The Soul Edge is a sword of immeasurable power. Those who have tried to wield it have failed and perished for their foolishness. Now the pirate Cervantes has taken the sword and disappeared. You take the role of one of 10 warriors who want to posses the sword. A tournament has been arranged, and the winner will have the opportunity to use the Soul Edge. That is the basic premise of Soul Blade. While the Arcade mode is the main feature, other modes include Versus Battle, Team Battle, Survival, Time Attack, and Edge-Master. The most unique of all of the modes is Edge-Master, where each character is given a unique map and story. By progressing through the plot, new weapons and moves for each character are unlocked. Try to capture the Soul Edge and fight your way through Soul Blade.
title: Soul Blade

description: We get to see the future of racing in Hi-Octane, where hover cars loaded to the gills with weapons are the race vehicles. You can choose from six different cars with different attributes, but all of them are loaded with shields, mini-guns, and missiles. Lean into the turns and learn the hazards of a particular track with the Single Race mode. Those in for the long haul should play the Championship mode and race on all nine tracks. If dealing with other racers causes pain, play a Clone Race and have a time trial against an identical car. For those with a violent streak, Death Match places you in an arena with seven other cars, where the last car running wins. If you have friends that want to play, use the two-player split-screen option or the eight-player hot seat option. We have seen the future of racing, and it is Hi-Octane.
title: Hi-Octane

description: Step into the role of Han Solo's good pal, Dash Rendar, as you lead a Rebel force against the always-menacing Empire. You'll journey across nine distinctly detailed environments each straight from the STAR WARS universe as the game switches modes and perspectives constantly to provide a richly varied gaming experience. The Rebels fight right alongside you on the first level, as you steer a Snowspeeder through packs of AT-ATs, AT-STs, and Probe Droids. After that, you're on your own as you explore the ice-covered caverns of Echo Base trying to find your ship, the Outrider. As if that wasn't a full-day's work, the next level sets you up blasting TIE Fighters and TIE Bombers, dodging deadly asteroids all the while. Before the game ends, you'll find yourself atop a moving train, walking through Gall Spaceport, jetpacking through the air, riding a Swoop Bike through Mos Eisley, and more. Once you've completed each level, you'll have the option to go back to completed levels and search for obscured Challenge Points in order to advance your cause. With excellent animations, sound effects right out of STAR WARS, and some of the most original gameplay ever, this game is worthy of the Lucas stamp of approval.
title: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire

description: The very first sports title ever to hit the Nintendo 64 from Williams and Nintendo. This is considered the NBA Jam of hockey. If you are looking for realism, you may want to wait for the next hockey title. Wayne Gretzky?s 3D Hockey is all about fun. Hilarious one-liners from the announcer and huge checks that send even the biggest of hockey players sent sprawling. High scoring sets the theme for this game, however, if you start to get sick of the 11-10 games, switch on the simulation option and a play a little more realistic brand of hockey.
title: Wayne Gretzky's 3D Hockey

description: Nintendo has ported their hit fighting game, KILLER INSTINCT GOLD, to the Nintendo 64. The game combines the features and characters of KILLER INSTINCT 2 with the power of the N64 to create a whole new fighting experience. The camera tracks the action back and forth over the 2D plane as the two fighters duke it out, giving some great camera angles. There are many characters and locations to choose from, as well as some that become available when certain tasks are completed. The battle system is based on combos, which must be performed by pressing one of the six attack buttons. By using the Tutorial, players will be able to do the most difficult attacks with enough practice. The game supports two players, and each must be well versed in the combat system to be successful. While the concepts in KILLER INSTINCT GOLD are easy to pick up, they require foresight and planning to exploit to the maximum.
title: Killer Instinct Gold

description: After leaving his 7-Up can, Spot is sucked into a film projector, which puts him into several different Hollywood scenarios including the Old West, Pirate World, Outer Space, Horror World, and the Mine Cart World. You must guide Spot through 100 of these stages where he must collect the little red dots scattered throughout. Naturally, all of the environments are dangerous and have unique enemies, but Spot can use the power of carbonation to vanquish his foes. As he progresses through some of the levels, special shots will become available that can freeze enemies or make them float around inside a bubble. It's up to you to help Spot get out of Hollywood and return to his soda can in SPOT GOES TO HOLLYWOOD.
title: Spot Goes to Hollywood

description: The Imperium has steadily expanded over the last few decades. With ever-expanding borders, new threats constantly arise. Mankind's greatest threat is the Genestealers, a parasitic race that is constantly looking for new species to be hosts for their young. They travel from planet to planet in gigantic ships known as Space Hulks looking for easy targets. Now, they are heading for the Imperium. You take the role of a space marine and your job is to infiltrate a Space Hulk and stop the Genestealers. While you start the game as a rookie, you will eventually be put in command of a squad and will have to complete a number of mission objectives that range from planting bombs to item recovery. However, you will have to keep an eye out for the enemy, and blast them with an arsenal of weapons that include lightning claws, assault cannons, and grenade launchers. Protect humanity from the evil Genestealers in SPACE HULK: Vengeance of the Blood Angels.
title: Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels

description: PlayStation fighting games enter the third dimension with TEKKEN. You can play as 18 characters including Kazuya, Michelle, King, Jack, Yoshimitsu, Nina, Law, and Paul Phoenix. All of the characters have unique fighting styles that result in individualized attacks and combinations. Now the animation is as realistic as possible, thanks to motion-capture technology. If you play the Arcade mode and defeat the roster of opponents, you are treated to a full-motion video sequence that explains the characters' motivation for entering the Iron Fist Tournament. If your friends think they can pull off a better 10-hit combination, make them prove it with the Versus mode. Do you have what it takes to become the king of TEKKEN?
title: Tekken

description: Throw on your finest footy kit and take to the pitch with the "virtual reality" simulation of VR SOCCER '96. This is European-style, lightning-fast football action for true aficionados of the world's most popular sport. You'll see realistic 3D, motion-captured athletes, and 22-player squads with up to eight skill levels per man. You'll compete in detailed, fully rendered stadiums while listening to colorful commentary from the humorous in-game announcer. The competition takes place in a wide variety of modes including Friendly, Practice, Arcade, Simulation, League, and Cup. You can watch the frantic action from six different camera angles, and there is an extensive options menu that allows for adjustments of game length, whether or not offsides is enabled, wind speed, and the like. With a choice of 44 international teams you can go head-to-head against the computer or a friend, or play in Two-Player Cooperative mode. With VR SOCCER '96 the game is truly afoot.
title: VR Soccer '96

description: Hop in the cockpit and take to the danger-filled skies in Top Gun: Fire at Will!. In this fight-in-flight game based on the smash-hit movie, you play as Maverick, an up and coming rookie out to prove himself. A variety of gameplay modes are available, and they include strafing missions, escort, low-altitude reconnaissance, intercept, and combat air patrols. You begin training with the essential and instructive missions at Miramar. Your goal is to complete your Top Gun training by maintaining a positive point total, a decent number of enemy kills, and reasonably low missile usage. When you feel up to the challenge, you'll advance and engage in "real" combat in theatres of war over Cuba, Korea, and finally Libya. Thankfully you have your co-pilot Merlin at your side, offering advice as Libya is the most difficult scenario and will test all your turn-and-burn daredevil skills in 11 fearsome missions.
title: Top Gun: Fire At Will

description: Golf aficionados will surely be pleased with WORLD CUP GOLF for the PlayStation. You can select from a wide variety of courses from around the world, each with a unique look, design, and feel. There is also a good selection of golfers to choose from, each with different abilities, so you're sure to find one that fits your playing style. The graphics are clear and crisp, showing each exotic locale in great detail. The unique hitting meter, once mastered, allows you to swing accurately and efficiently, taking much of the guesswork out of the process. WORLD CUP GOLF will please fans of the genre with its serious take on the game, and the Two-Player mode is not to missed, as it allows you to challenge your friends to find out who is the lord of the links.
title: World Cup Golf: Professional Edition

description: Fighting game with a unique quest mode, from Square.  The publisher enlisted the help of Seiichi Ishii, who had previously worked on both Tekken and Virtua Fighter. On these strengths, Square helped Ishii start his own development company, Dream Factory, and Tobal No.1 is the first game from the developer. The game offers some 3D movement for more behind-the-back attacks that fighting games released around the same time. Tobal also introduced an interesting grapple move, which allows you to grab your opponent and, depending on your button execution, throw them in a myriad of ways. The game features Gouraud-shaded players displayed in hi-res mode (640x480) and shipped with an included Final Fantasy VII demo.
title: Tobal No. 1

description: Blaze into vehicular combat mayhem with TWISTED METAL from Sony. It is the year 2010; desecration and madness have spread across the cities like a plague. You are the fastest and toughest car commando alive, and your task is to choose from more than a dozen hi-tech, battle-hardened street machines like taxi cabs, police cars, motorcycles, and ice cream trucks and compete in contests of brute force and MAD MAX-style survival. Try to find the time to enjoy the stunning, fully interactive 3D scenery as you careen from building to building and street to street in an attempt to evade your evil pursuers and emerge victorious. In Single-Player mode or Head-to-Head PlayStation-networked battle, you'll race through five different worlds, shooting and maneuvering against devilish foes and bizarre criminals. Wage deadly war with awesome weapons like machine guns, flamethrowers, and missile launchers, and switch between four camera views including dashboard POV and third-person perspective. In the psychotic, hard-driving insanity of TWISTED METAL, you'll need nerves of steel to survive the sick but fun demolition derby from Hell.
title: Twisted Metal [1996]

description: WIPEOUT XL marks the return of the popular futuristic racer to the PlayStation. Just as in the original game, players must race across crazy tracks while driving hovercraft from the future. On top of the racing action, players need to collect weapons in order to take down their closet competitors. This game introduces the Pit, where any player can stop to regain valuable shield energy. There is also a Two-Player mode, enabling two people to take to the course at the same time and determine who is the superior racer. The music from the first game is gone, but this time around there is licensed music from popular bands like as Prodigy and The Chemical Brothers. Everything in WIPEOUT XL has been updated, with weapons that are even more destructive, music that provides even more of an adrenaline rush, and courses that keep players busy for a long time.
platforms: PS PSP PS3 PC Saturn Mac
title: WipEout XL
Doraemon Nobita & The 3 Fairy Spirit Stones

description: Xevious 3D/G+ is a compilation of various Xevious arcade games, brought perfectly intact to the Playstation console. The main feature is Xevious 3D/G, a full update of the classic space shooter with simultaneous 2-player action, new weapons, new scenery, new enemies, and fully three-dimensional graphics. The other members of this compilation are the original Xevious, Super Xevious, and Xevious Arrangement. Furthermore, Xevious 3D/G+ includes extra options and secret bonuses not found in the arcade versions of these games.
title: Xevious 3D/G+

description: Monster trucks come to the PlayStation with THUNDER TRUCK RALLY. There are a total of nine drivers to choose from, each with a unique truck. After choosing a driver, you can choose to compete in three different styles of race: Circuit, Endurance, and Car Crush. Circuit has you trying to complete a certain number of laps on a particular track, Endurance calls for you to race through nine checkpoints in a specific order, and in Car Crush you try to get the fastest time while driving over cars. All three of these race types can be played in the Championship, Practice, Multiplayer, and Time Trial modes. Now, thanks to THUNDER TRUCK RALLY you can get monster truck action on any day of the week.
title: Thunder Truck Rally

description: If you like your basketball arcade-style, take note: it just doesn't get any more arcade-style than HANG TIME. The two-on-two action is extreme, as you choose two players from your favorite team and send them into high-flying, in-your-face basketball action. With better animation than any game of its kind, NBA HANG TIME features hysterical, running play-by-play commentary to keep things comical. The players and stats have all been updated to reflect current lineups and trends, and each NBA team is represented.  If the regular NBA guys are boring you, you can actually create your own player! Choose from a variety of body types and heads (they include animal faces and the likenesses of the game's designers), then give your player any attributes you think will give you an edge. The more games you win with your player, the more points you get, and the better you can make your player. HANG TIME offers some great options, such as AI assistance, very effective power-ups, oversized heads, and lots of humorous codes to change the gameplay around. It might not look anything like real basketball, but Shaq just can't do a quadruple flip in real life .
platforms: PS N64 Arcade PC SNES Gen
title: NBA Hang Time

description: ALL-STAR BASEBALL '97: Featuring Frank Thomas creates the most realistic baseball experience on the PlayStation. With motion-capture help from Frank Thomas, MLB and MLBPA licenses, and commentary from ESPN Sunday Night Baseball's Jon Miller, you will swear that you are watching a live game. To get the most realism, play through the grueling 162-game season or a tough playoff match-up. For a quick jolt of baseball excitement, play an Exhibition game, or play with the best of the best in the All-Star game. With all of this realism, you'll feel like you are standing at home plate.
title: All-Star Baseball '97 Featuring Frank Thomas

description: The most powerful beings of the past, present, and future have been awakened from the cosmos by a mysterious force. Now, they will come together to decide who amongst them is the mightiest! Play as one of 10 characters in this high-energy fighting extravaganza. You've seen games of this style before, but never one with such impressive graphics or characters. Based on the coin-operated original, WAR GODS features among its fighters the Egyptian God of Mummification, a tribal witch doctor, a cyborg from the year 2096, and a Viking Goddess. Each character is given a damage meter that gradually shrinks as he receives blows, and a game ends when one character's meter expires. By using combos and special attacks, you'll increase your chances of winning. If you defeat all of the primary characters, you'll earn the right to face two different uber-fighters: Exor and Grox. There are five different difficulty levels, and fully customizable options such as continues, fatalities, and control settings. Courage is important, but power is the key in this all-out battle of the ages.
title: War Gods

description: An action adventure with real-time elements. Play as a soldier sent into Area 51 to defuse the bombs planted by a violent scientist, and play out one of many possible plot branches. Outwit enemies and escape dangers that continue to move through and among other levels.
title: Broken Helix

description: CODENAME: Tenka takes place in the near future. Trojan, inc. has been performing illegal genetic experiments with alien DNA. Unfortunately, they make a mistake and cross Tenka. Take control of Tenka as he tries to extract revenge by running, jumping, crawling, and blasting his way through 20 expansive levels of action. Several things help Tenka survive: a laser sight makes targeting enemies much easier, enemies die at a much quicker rate after Tenka attaches missiles and other weapons to the basic gun, and power-ups add even more destructive force to weapons. Thanks to a revolutionary new graphics engine, all of the enemies are 3D polygonal models and many of the environments have multiple levels, so beware of snipers. Can Tenka get revenge and stop the evil Trojan Corporation? Play CODENAME: Tenka and find out.
title: Codename: Tenka

description: The MORTAL KOMBAT series is one of the most famous in videogame history, and now Midway the developers of MK have returned with a new fighting game called WAR GODS, for the PlayStation. The gameplay remains similar to the MK series, though there are several ways in which it is radically different. First and foremost is the jump to 3D, which grants the ability to walk around a fully polygonal environment. The graphics still maintain the digitized sprites, making the game look realistic without causing any stutters in the framerate this keeps the action fast and steady. There are 10 warriors to choose from, each with a different set of moves and combination attacks that can be performed. The sound effects and music are similar to the MK series, meaning they sound authentic and really help the player get in the mood to battle. WAR GODS allows one or two players the chance to find out who is the ultimate warrior in this intense 3D fighter.
title: War Gods

description: HEXEN creates a creative gameplay experience by combining elements of first-person shooters with role-playing games. An evil empire has decided to eliminate all of its political opposition and you must stop them. You can play as warrior, mage, or cleric; each character type has advantages and disadvantages. The warrior cannot cast magic but has unbelievable physical strength; Mages, on the other hand, have powerful magic and are weak physically; and Clerics are balanced with decent strength and magic. As you progresses through levels, your character gains experience and new abilities, and you can also store power-ups for later use thanks to a nifty inventory system. With 3D graphics and CD-quality sound, HEXEN is an audio-visual delight. Are you brave enough to travel into the world of HEXEN and stop the killings?
platforms: PS PC N64 PC Mac Saturn
title: Hexen

description: Aliens have invaded another mining colony and are holding the workers hostage. The aliens want to use the colony as a base, and you are the only person who can save the workers and prevent the aliens from taking over. Luckily, you are in a vehicle specially designed to navigate the tight corridors of the mineshafts. Your vehicle is also equipped with guns, missiles, and other weapons you can use to destroy the alien threat. Don't miss a single detail of the 30 levels thanks to the fully 3D environments. If you need some help or just want to destroy a human opponent, connect two PlayStations with a link cable and let the good times roll. Do you have the skills and balance to save the mineworkers? Play DESCENT MAXIMUM and find out.
title: Descent Maximum

description: THE CITY OF LOST CHILDREN follows the plot of the French movie of the same name. The story centers on Miette, an orphan who lives in a local orphanage. Unfortunately, the evil pair of Siamese twins who run the home force Miette to perform various tasks for them; most of the time, the twins want her to steal things. While this may not been an ideal situation for a little girl, Miette is relatively safe. Suddenly, a dark presence appears and starts to steal children's souls and dreams. Now, Miette must find out who or what is responsible and try to find the lost children. You, as Miette, will use a point-and-click interface to solve puzzles while exploring environments that look like they were pulled from the movie. Will Miette be able to save the children? Play THE CITY OF LOST CHILDREN and find out.
title: The City of Lost Children

description:
Get ready for an adventure across space in Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom. Now that the Terran-Kilrathi war has ended, the Confederation is looking to keep peace in the galaxy. Unfortunately, civil wars keep cropping up and players are called upon to stamp out the growing number of fires. Unfortunately, the Confederation may not prove strong enough to withstand all this unrest.

The story follows Colonel Blair of the Confederation, who is called upon to quell a rebellion by other pilots. Colonel Blair is played by Mark Hamill of Star Wars fame, who offers up another great performance as a star pilot. The gameplay requires the player to shoot other ships while following various objectives from a first-person perspective. There is even the ability to change the way the plot moves, by making different choices throughout the game. Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom features first-rate acting and special effects, with the same exciting gameplay that the previous games in the series have had.
title: Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom

description: You awaken from a cryogenic sleep with no memory of who you are, why you were put to sleep, or who woke you up. After getting out of your chamber and searching the area for essentials, you discover that your name is Raz Karcy but that's all you know. Now, you must try to escape the underground compound where you are being held, as well as try to recover your memory. As you progress through the game, you will have to explore the compound to find items that will help your cause.
